body_html:
Technically, no images >20k should be in the repo. We once had a presubmit for that, but not sure it's doing its job. Especially the images in various g3doc subfolders seem very suspect.

Those should probably be deleted (the folders) -- they don't belong on github at all, docs_srcs should be it.

body:
Technically, no images >20k should be in the repo. We once had a presubmit for that, but not sure it's doing its job. Especially the images in various g3doc subfolders seem very suspect.

Those should probably be deleted (the folders) -- they don't belong on github at all, docs_srcs should be it.
